item.title: NFS - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: Today, I will learn what is NFS and how it's used to escalate privilege.

item.title: $PATH Hijacking - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: One of the paths to privilege escalation on Linux is a $PATH Hijacking. This post will be showcasing how to exploit PATH

item.title: Crob Job to Root - Linux Escalation Privilege
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: One of the paths to privilege escalation on Linux is a abusing the misconfiguration of a Cron Job. This post will be showcasing how cron job can lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: Capabilities - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: I am exploring what is capabilities and how to exploit it. To help me learn the material, I will be using TryHackMe room as my lab

item.title: Exploring SUID Exploit - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: I am exploring SUID exploit which is often used in privilege escalation. To help me learn the material, I will be using TryHackMe room as my lab.

item.title: sudo - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: Today, I'm taking a look at using sudo to escalate a local user privilege to a root (administrator) privilege.

item.title: Kernel Exploits - Linux Privilege Escalation
item.author: Nguyen Nguyen
item.description: One of the paths to privilege escalation on Linux is a Kernal Exploit. This post will be showcasing how Kernel Exploit works.
